backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining file, note, folder, mission, and task data models with storage, access control, and health/diagnostic query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a frontend UI change request related to mission task entry placement and its associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend file responsibilities covering core components, hooks, utilities, and UI behavior.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing the creation and validation of a Draft baseline identical to Live version 114, including procedures and verification results.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Post-restore change freeze notice outlining prohibited modifications and required user approval before further changes.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling minimal precaching, runtime caching, and network‑first fetch logic.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that all frontend files and behaviors match Live version 114 after restoration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper managing theme, providers, and showing intro logic based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component rendering error states for actor initialization with retry, logout, and technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom divider line for UI decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when a browser blocks external opening.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Modal that previews files by type and provides actions such as open, download, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files, creating links, and creating notes with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI, with disabled and overlay-aware styling.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog allowing creation, renaming, selection, and deletion of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder management view supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen viewer for navigating, previewing, sharing, moving, downloading, and deleting files with swipe support.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a gallery of files and notes with selection, long‑press, and viewer dialogs. Handles file type icons, touch gestures, and interactions like open, move, delete, and share.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with theme toggle, authentication menu, and a progress bar. Integrates Internet Identity sign‑out and theme switching.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief animated splash screen with fade‑out timing before completing initialization. Calls onComplete after the animation finishes.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot open, allowing retry or copying the URL. Uses UI components and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state. Handles disabled state while signing in.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission detail view with title editing, tasks, autosave, and attached files/notes. Supports viewing attachments and handling external link fallback.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task list management. Handles validation, task addition, and mission creation via backend.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens mission view, styled with animations and disabled/overlay states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Displays a full-screen list of missions with selection, progress calculation, swipe actions, and mission deletion.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wraps children in a container intended for mobile-only layouts.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog allowing files or notes to be moved to a selected mission, handling loading and mutation states.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with options to download, share, move, or delete it.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes to folders or back to the main collection with performance logging.
Provides swipe-to-reveal edit and delete actions with pointer gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a global upload progress bar when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Renders the introductory welcome screen with a target-themed SVG and text, ending in a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides context for creating and managing a backend actor with retry, error handling, and admin-token initialization.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Manages upload batches, progress updates, and completion state for file and link uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Wraps Dfinity AuthClient to manage Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer to distinguish touch vs. mouse input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Provides debounced mission autosaving with change detection, queueing, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and managing missions via the backend actor with identity-aware fetch conditions and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for creating, fetching, deleting, and moving notes, including folder and mission–scoped queries with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for files and folders, including listing by folder or mission, creating folders, and handling upload concurrency.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout, and component color systems.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page managing UI state for folders and missions, running initial data queries, and optionally triggering dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Classifies initialization-related actor errors and provides helper checks and standardized user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities for opening external URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing files using the Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, supporting viewer, preview, or direct download modes.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type, checks previewability, and provides readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares arrays of tasks safely with BigInt task IDs to detect equality.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Lightweight performance logging utility with timing and async operation helpers, enabled via flags.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Debug helpers for inspecting React Query cache state and logging mutation lifecycle details.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a multi-step smoke test validating folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list API consistency.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise concurrency limiter with a queue and configurable parallelism.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, and content paths, plus plugins for animations and typography.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files constituting the verified Live version 114 baseline.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, scope constraints, feature info, and a pending request to reorder the mission creation form layout.
